section.title: License
section.para: Most of the code for this module has been released under BSD by iptelorg. The GPL parts are released with an exception to link with OpenSSL toolkit software components.

section.title: History
section.para: For version 3.1 most of the TLS specific code was completely re-written to add support for asynchronous TLS and fix several long standing bugs.
The code is currently maintained by Andrei Pelinescu-Onciul andrei@iptel.org.
Install does not generate self-signed certificates by default anymore. In order to generate them now you should do "make install-tls-cert"
